name: Letterpress Wedding Invitations 'Amber' // 2 Colour, Made to order
description:
A two colour letterpress wedding invitation printed with a light impression on premium soft 100% cotton paper (425gsm).

Dimensions: 89 x 124mm (3.5 x 4.9 inches).

Can be ordered with or without envelopes.

TO BUY: 
To order, contact me at mapleteapress@gmail.com with the following details: quantity required, country order will be posted to, ink colours, invite size and please let me know if you require envelopes to be added to the order.

The prices shown are for a single invitation, but unit prices varies according to quantity purchased, please see details below.

This design will be customised for your own wedding details via a series of digital proofs until we get the perfect layout. If you have any questions about pricing, colours or cardstock please view my SHOP FAQS - mapletea.co.uk/faqs, or feel free to contact me at mapleteapress@gmail.com.

The invitations are printed by hand on a vintage letterpress machine.

ENVELOPES:
The envelopes vary in price and quality, pictured with the invitation is a premium 135gsm (quite thick, wallet style flap, peel and seal) Kraft envelope, but other options are available. Prices below. There are some photos here to help you decide - http://tinyurl.com/aestcpt . If you wish to source your own envelopes this is not a problem and you will save on postage costs.

name: Boxed Luxury Writing Set - 'Vertigo'
description:
A letterpress printed stationery set including notecards and a moleskine notebook. This gift set is letterpress printed by hand with an Illustration on each flat notecard, envelope and notepad. Thick 270gsm premium quality card (FSC approved, archival) is used for the notecards. The letterpress printing method means that each printed motif leaves a distinct impression in the paper - giving both a tactile quality and a luxurious feel to the paper and card used in this writing set.

The illustration is inspired by a scene from the Alfred Hitchcock film 'Vertigo', it was hand drawn and converted into a printing block.

Each stationery set is letterpress printed using an old hand-fed printing press. Each set contains:

* 1 Moleskine Kraft Cahier notebook, letterpress printed with the Panther design (plain pages).
* 6 letterpress printed notecards on high quality archival 270gsm card in Pale grey, A6 size.
* 6 letterpress printed notecards on high quality archival 270gsm card in Soft white, A6 size.
* 12 matching recycled brown envelopes printed with the panther design (C6 size).
* 6 white mini notelets printed with the panther design (115x90mm).

Boxed in a sturdy brown kraft gift box (C6 size), tied with bakers twine and one letterpress printed brown kraft label.

name: Letterpress Business Cards, Inkless // made to order, set of 100.
description:
Hand printed letterpress business cards on gorgeous high quality 100% cotton card stocks. 

Three weights are available:
1. Pure white cotton 300gsm
2. Natural white cotton 425gsm
3. Pure white cotton 600gsm

These cards are printed without ink, they are 'blind debossed' meaning that an impression is made in the paper. They are printed by hand using an old letterpress printing press.  It is an old fashioned method of printing, more laborious than modern methods, but it allows you to achieve a deep impression on the card that you cannot get from digital forms of printing. 

WORD COUNT LIMIT - no more than 80 characters.
Due to the method used, there is a limit to how much text may be printed. Please only enquire if you are happy to stay within this limit.

Each stationery set is letterpress printed by hand using a printed block. Each set contains:

description:

PLEASE READ DETAILS BEFORE PURCHASING!

The price given for this listing is a guide only, as this is a bespoke product. Please email mapleteapress@gmail.com before buying so that we can discuss design, colour, and cardstock options. 

The business cards pictured are a guide, to show examples of potential styles, fonts and colours. We can work together on a design, or you can describe the look you want and leave it to me (you'll get a proof to sign off).
